remarks: Alternate proof of ~ demoivre .  It is longer but does not use the exponential function.  This is Metamath 100 proof #17.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 10-Nov-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: demoivreALT $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ^ N ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) $.
